channel.title: token sale on BloxTop
channel.description: Recent content in token sale on BloxTop

item.title: BCH bounce
item.description: BCH bounce There is a 30% dip since 2020-2-14 and short-term bottom pattern may form soon. A bounce is expected. Celo token sale Celo is an open-source platform planning to issue a utility digital token Celo Gold and a stablecoin Celo Dollar. Celo will have a public sale on CoinList. According to a CoinList customer, auction is already open. Celo has already raised a total of $36.5M in funding over 2 rounds with participation of Polychain Capital and Andreessen Horowitz among others.
